div.pre: 1342 Rhodes (the city), 1968 Burial: 2nd cent. B.C. (M) Contents: 110 AR Rhodes: 2 tetradr. 10 didr. 98 dr. (as BMC 235 ff.) Disposition: Rhodes Konstantinopoulos-Zervoudaki, Archaiologika Analecta ex Athen≈çn 1968, p. 259, illus. To be published by M. Oeconomides
